column5: For those interested, I made a post last week about my brothers pro MMA fight in Calgary on Friday.  Well he won and I wrote up a whole play by play with pictures on another site, here: http://www.sherdog.net/forums/f61/raw-comb...-photos-801910/  For MMA fans, David Loiseau, Travis Galbraith, Doug Evans and Dan Hornbuckle were also on the card.

Right on!!! I have a co worker that also won in Calgary on Friday. His name is Nathan "The Machinnnnne" Gunn. His is 2 and 0 in Calgary his last two fights. If you looked at him, believe me, you wouldn't want to fight him.   Congrats to your brother!!!
My brother lived and trained in Thunder Bay all last year, so him and Nate are good buddies.  He won by rear naked choke in round 1, the fight wasnt even close.  The kid is a monster, he's 5-0 now.
Kewl!! The Crow is a bad donkey too!!
DanC.  The play by play I posted is for the whole event, so there's pictures of Nate in his win aswell
right on man, me and the wife regularly watch UFC and stuff when we can, and I have seen a few fights on TV from Calgary as well....congrats to your brother man
Just looked at the pics now Steve. Nice!!! Thanks for posting.
Awesome stuff!!! Thanks for the link
right on!!!! glad he came out on top!  Cheers!
Thanks guys, it was a good event!

Good stuff Steve, I saw your post over on Sherdog. I noticed your sig says Team Go-Riki. DO you train with Gary Goodridges boys? I train with Paul Minhas at UMA a good friend and one of Gary's Muay Thai coaches.
what no video this time,nice work for your bro thanks for the link mma fights are the second greatest sport going next to fishing of course.modern day gladiators that stuff gets me pumped.
No video yet, it was recorded as far as I know.  He took a bit of a beating on his feet but he had Zvonick's number on the ground
